name: @borgar/simple-xml
description: A reasonably fast, simple and pure-JS XML parser with no dependencies

scripts.check: npm run test && npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.docs: typedoc && concat-md tempdocs > API.md && rm -rf tempdocs
scripts.build: npm run build:dist && npm run docs && echo 'Success!'
scripts.release: git diff --exit-code && tsup && npm publish && V=$(jq -r .version package.json) && git tag -a $V -m $V && git push origin $V && gh release create $V --generate-notes
